title: She Wants To Buy My Special Sauce
itunes:title: She Wants To Buy My Special Sauce
description:
Dear Steve and Shirley, I am a 37 year old married man with one son from a previous marriage and one son with my new wife. I’ve been remarried for almost 4 years and my life is great now. I have a great relationship with my ex-wife and my son is staying with me because he needs a strong male role model in his life. My wife is friendly with my ex-wife and that makes me love her even more. I do believe she’s what I needed in my life all along................

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
